chapter.text: Dang wei xinzhe lai jian ni de shihou, tamen shuo:“Women zuozheng, ni que shi zhenzhu de shizhe.” Zhenzhu zhidao ni que shi ta de shizhe, zhen zhu zuozheng, wei xin de renmen que shi shuohuang de
Tamen yi ziji de mengshi wei hufu, fang'ai zhu dao. Tamen de xingwei zhen elie
Zhe shi yinwei tamen koucheng xindao, xin shi bu xin, tamen de xin jiu fengbile, gu tamen bushi mingli de.§

Dang ni kanjian tamen de shihou, tamen de tige, jiang shi ni zantan. Ruguo tamen shuohua, ni jiu jing ting tamen de yanci, tamen haoxiang mu'ou yiyang, tamen yiweiyiqie nahan, dou shi dui tamen er fa de. Tamen que shi diren, gu ni dang jinfang tamen. Yuan zhenzhu zhu mie tamen! Tamen shi ruhe beimiu de ne
Youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen lai daoqian ba, shizhe jiang wei nimen qiurao.” Tamen que diaotou bugu, ni kan tamen wangzizunda, bu ken daoqian
Ni wei tamen qiurao yu fou, zhe zai tamen shi yiyang de. Zhenzhu jue bu she you tamen, zhenzhu biding bu yindao beini de minzhong
Tamen shuo:“Nimen buyao gongji shizhe zuoyou de ren, yibian tamen lisan.” Tiandi de kucang, zhishi zhenzhu de, wei xin de renmen que buming li
Tamen shuo:“Ruguo women fanhui mai di na, zun rong zhe bi jiang beijian zhe quzhu chucheng.” Zun rong zhishi zhenzhu he shizhe yiji xinshimen de, er wei xin de renmen que buming li
Xindao de renmen a! Nimen de caichan he zinu, buyao shi nimen hulue 418	di liusi zhang xiang qi (tai ang bo ni) le jinian zhenzhu. Shei nayang zuo, shei shi kui she de

Zai siwang jianglin zhiqian, nimen dangfen she wo ciyu nimen de, fouze, jianglai ren ren shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Ni weihe bu rang wo yanchi dao yige linjin de dingqi, yibian wo you suo shishe, er chengwei shanren ne?”
Dan shou xian yi dao, zhenzhu jue bu rang renhe ren yanchi, zhenzhu shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de
